title: What's new in v2.51.0
content:
Enhancements:
- Timelapse recording works with different canvas sizes (canvas resize no longer removes previous timelapse data)
- Layer preview now shows trimmed images
- Dithering pressure presets
- Option to duplicate the tileset when duplicating tilemap layers
- Option to keep the arrangement when converting a regular layer to a tilemap layer
- Reworked color palette color edit and removal
- Added joystick to no-UI mode
- Quick pinch to fit canvas on screen
- Added a reset button to canvas resize
